00020 #include "rlandmark.h"
00021 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00022 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RLandmark"
00023 
00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00025 
00026     RDK2_FACTORY(RLandmark);
00027 
00028     void RLandmark::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00029     {
00030         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00031             RDK2::Object::writeObjectBody ( w );
00032             w->write_f64(x);
00033             w->write_f64(y);
00034             w->write_f64(percept.rho);
00035             w->write_f64(percept.theta);
00036             w->write_f32(odometryPose.x);
00037             w->write_f32(odometryPose.y);
00038             w->write_f32(odometryPose.theta);
00039             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.x);
00040             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.y);
00041             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.theta);
00042             w->write_f32(timestamp);
00043             w->write_f32(ipc_timestamp);
00044             w->writeString(ipc_hostname);
00045         w->doneWriting();
00046     }
00047 
00048     void RLandmark::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00049     {
00050         r->startReading(getClassName());
00051             RDK2::Object::readObjectBody ( r );
00052             x = r->read_f64();
00053             y = r->read_f64();
00054             percept.rho = r->read_f64();
00055             percept.theta = r->read_f64();
00056             odometryPose.x = r->read_f32();
00057             odometryPose.y = r->read_f32();
00058             odometryPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00059             estimatedPose.x = r->read_f32();
00060             estimatedPose.y = r->read_f32();
00061             estimatedPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00062             timestamp= r->read_f32();
00063             ipc_timestamp = r->read_f32();
00064             ipc_hostname = r->readString();
00065         r->doneReading();
00066     }
00067 
00068     std::string RLandmark::getLogLine() const
00069     {
00070         ostringstream oss;
00071         oss << logtag << " ";
00072         oss << x << " ";
00073         oss << y << " ";
00074         oss << percept.rho << " ";
00075         oss << percept.theta << " ";
00076         oss << odometryPose.x << " ";
00077         oss << odometryPose.y << " ";
00078         oss << odometryPose.theta << " ";
00079         oss << estimatedPose.x << " ";
00080         oss << estimatedPose.y << " ";
00081         oss << estimatedPose.theta << " ";
00082         oss << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " ";
00083         oss << ipc_hostname << " ";
00084         oss << ipc_timestamp.getMsFromMidnight();
00085         return oss.str();
00086     }
00087 
00088     bool RLandmark::loadFromLogLine(cstr line)
00089     {
00090         stringstream iss(line);
00091         string name;
00092         iss >> name;
00093         if (name != logtag)
00094         {
00095             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("The log line must start with " << logtag);
00096             return false;
00097         }
00098 
00099         iss >> x >> y >> percept.rho >> percept.theta;
00100         iss >> odometryPose.x >> odometryPose.y >> odometryPose.theta;
00101         iss >> estimatedPose.x >> estimatedPose.y >> estimatedPose.theta;
00102         unsigned long a;
00103         iss >> a;
00104         timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00105         iss >> ipc_hostname;
00106         iss >> a;
00107         ipc_timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00108         return true;
00109     }
